articles.description: Hyundai has unveiled the 2024 version of its i20 N Line model globally. The 2024 iteration features minimal updates, focusing mostly on the hatchback's front end. As part of the update, the 2024 Hyundai i20 N Line loses out on the chequered pattern on the fro…
articles.content:
